ygData.subject: Re: What level do you need to be able to take Squire Narls?
ygData.msgSnippet: I plan to bring a few friends.  A couple of spell casters at least one will root Squire Narls.   then they will burn him while I beat on him.  Probably will
ygData.messageBody:
I plan to bring a few friends. A couple of spell casters at least one will
root Squire Narls. then they will burn him while I beat on him. Probably
will have a fighter type along also like a monk.

When I first attacked him I was able to get him to below half hits several
times. then he would run and I would get out of range.. eventually he killed
me. Not the desirable out come.

From: "Ernest Dotson" <ewd5330@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date sent: Fri, 23 Apr 1999 15:30:46 -0400
Send reply to: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] What level do you need to be able to take Squire Narls?

> From: "Ernest Dotson" <ewd5330@...>
>
> Well, I just got back from a nice trip to the Butcherblocks, and the kind
> cleric who rebound me to Freeport threw in a bravery and a spirit armor just
> for grins. Self, I say, why not go and take out Narls so you can do that
> quest? Well, with about 287hp (God, I love bravery), a 1h slash skill of
> 33, full leather armor, and about five lesser heals thrown onto me by some
> nice wandering cleric, I managed to hit Narls five time before I died. Once
> for 10, once for 8, and three times for 1. Now, Narls is green to me, and
> I'm afraid if I go too much further levelwise, I wont be able to get this
> quest. Thoughts?
>
> Cheers,
> Jude Morrigan
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Are you hogging all the fun?
> http://www.ONElist.com
